channel.title: Artificial Intelligence on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Artificial Intelligence on FinanClub

item.title: PLTR
item.description: score:-59 Chances: Palantir’s huge government contract win has plenty of positive implications for shareholders. A $35 price target might seem ambitious, but there’s a clear path to get there. The data analytics powerhouse is up substantially in 2024 thanks to the growing adoption of AI.

item.title: IBM
item.description: score:148 Chances: Shares of IBM (IBM) are trading higher on Tuesday after Bank of America issued a bullish note on the company.The analyst behind the note claims that IBM is repositioned for substantial growth, thanks in part to its use of AI.Industry players like IBM, HPE and AGYS are gaining from the increased demand for integrated solutions and the growing adoption of the multi-cloud model, despite persistent supply chain constraints.

item.title: PATH
item.description: score:45 Chances: The market continues to hit highs, fueled by AI stocks, but is looking extended. A number of artificial intelligence-related stocks posted strong gains this week with potential entry opportunities. The robotics sector stands at the forefront of transformative growth, with certain stocks displaying the utmost potential for surefire success.

item.title: RBLX
item.description: score:2215 Chances: Roblox (RBLX) reached $42.66 at the closing of the latest trading day, reflecting a +1.79% change compared to its last close. Roblox and Paycom could be poised for massive rebounds in 2024. This growth stock is giving developers artificial intelligence tools to optimize their creations.
